bug.author: scarlett2018
bug.summary: Virtual Cluster with empty space can be created but can not be used
bug.description:
Organization Name: PAI PROD-1 How to reproduce it:
Created a VC named "A B" in web UI, the VC has been created successfully Add a user to this VC in User "Edit Info" page, it failed.
OpenPAI Environment:
OpenPAI version: 0.9.0
